title: Mobile Apps
description: Cross-platform apps with React Native/Flutter, from build to store publish and ongoing maintenance.

hero.headline: Native-Quality Mobile Apps, Cross-Platform Speed
hero.subheadline: React Native and Flutter apps that feel native, ship faster, and share code across iOS and Android.

benefits.title: Cross-Platform Efficiency
benefits.description: One codebase for iOS and Android, reducing development time and maintenance costs by up to 60%.

benefits.title: Native Performance
benefits.description: 60 FPS animations, platform-specific UI patterns, and optimized builds that feel truly native.

benefits.title: Offline-First Architecture
benefits.description: Local databases, sync strategies, and resilient UX that works even when connectivity drops.

benefits.title: Push Notifications & Deep Linking
benefits.description: Full integration with FCM/APNs, dynamic links, and attribution tracking for user re-engagement.

benefits.title: Store Optimization
benefits.description: App Store/Play Store listing optimization, review management, and compliance guidance.

benefits.title: CI/CD & Testing
benefits.description: Automated builds, E2E testing on real devices, and over-the-air updates for rapid iteration.

process.title: Requirements & Platform Choice
process.description: Define features, choose between React Native/Flutter based on constraints, and plan architecture.

process.title: Design & Prototyping
process.description: Platform-specific UI/UX patterns, interactive prototypes, and design system adapted for mobile.

process.title: Development & Testing
process.description: Cross-platform development with real device testing, performance profiling, and code reviews.

process.title: Store Submission & Support
process.description: App Store/Play Store submission, compliance review, and ongoing maintenance + updates.
